channel.title: MoparScape Editing
channel.description: Hello! i need some help, i want to edit the map of my server for put more monsters... and i want put the start set.. what i need edit? i'm new in this

item.title: MoparScape Editing
item.dc:creator: @raiden123 raiden123
item.description:
@raiden123 wrote:

[quote=“buckybkatt, post:4, topic:344044”]Search for

if(starter == 0){

In your client.java

If you have it, it might look something like this…

if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); apset = true; addItem(995, 100000); yell("" + playerName + " has just joined the server."); System.out.println(""+ playerName +" Has just created an account!"); }

When you want to add items, just add this under the first “addItem”

addItem(itemID, itemAMOUNT);

If you don’t have that… You could try adding it in? It might give you errors though…[/quote]

i search it a lot and i don’t have it… where i need to put it? because i no have idea

PD: i added it to the client.java but it don’t works (i add it on the top)

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape Editing
item.dc:creator: @buckybkatt buckybkatt
item.description:
@buckybkatt wrote:

Search for

if(starter == 0){

In your client.java

If you have it, it might look something like this…

if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); apset = true; addItem(995, 100000); yell("" + playerName + " has just joined the server."); System.out.println(""+ playerName +" Has just created an account!"); }

When you want to add items, just add this under the first “addItem”

addItem(itemID, itemAMOUNT);

If you don’t have that… You could try adding it in? It might give you errors though…

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape Editing
item.dc:creator: @raiden123 raiden123
item.description:
@raiden123 wrote:

yeoldhag:

For the monsters go to autospawn.cfg (or somthing like that). For starter do you want to make it so you have a starter command? or just log in with it. If just log in with it look in Player.java

i want to just log with it… but what i need edit in the player.java? i’m new in this!

And thanks for the monsters help

Read full topic
